summary: Small script to make every encounter more cinematic
descriptionHtml:
Hey guys, Just an update on the file, i have attached a working .esp for killmoves creasted by Yoo203.

So basically yoo203 made a simple .esp file that enables a higher chance of inflicting a finishing move.

2 versions of the .esp is contained in the zip file
killmove.esp = 100 killmove 75 decap
decap50.esp = 100 killmove 50 decap

NOTE: just because killmoverandom is set to 100 doesn\'t mean that you\'ll have 100% chance, the higher level the monster, less of a chance you\'ll have, and the cinematic only works in 1v1 situation.

here is a link to yoo203\'s mod and if you have any questions or bugs you should find him at this link 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4409

All credit goes to Yoo203 for creating the working .esp file.

INSTALLATION
To install this mod place the .esp file into your skyrim data folder, launch your \"skyrim launcher\" and click on \"data\" and make sure you have the esp file enabled.

INSTALLATION -2nd method
Delete the combat.esp file located in your data folder if you have already downloaded my earlier mod.
Place the txt doc labeled combat.txt into your skyrim data folder.
Start you game up and open up your console ~ and type in bat combat
Values should now work.


Thanks Rivo

Special thanks to Yoo203\'s
author: Yoo203
